name: Glaceon

passive.name: Unstable Genes
passive.effect: You may treat Ice Energy cards as Basic Energy cards with the type of any Pokemon with the "Unstable Genes" ability.

attacks.name: Hail
attacks.effect: Put a damage counter on the Defending Pokemon. Put a damage counter on your opponent's Benched Pokemon.

attacks.name: Ice Out
attacks.effect: Choose up to 3 cards without looking from your opponent's hand and set them aside until the end of their turn. They may instead return the cards to their hand immediately; if they do, this attack deals 30 more damage.

flavor: A scientist wanted her Eevee to live forever and cryogenically froze it. Eevee reacted to this experiment in a very unexpected way.
